Package ohos.agp.components

Class SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    SlideDrawer

    public static class SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Configures layout parameters of SlideDrawer, including the width, height, margin, SlideDirection, and DisplayMode.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction
      Indicates the direction value.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        height, MATCH_CONTENT, MATCH_PARENT, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayoutConfig​()
      Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, where the default width and height have been set for MATCH_CONTENT.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with specified layout width and height.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified width, height, and alignment parameters of a layout.
      LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the parameters (width, height, and margin) of a source layout.
      LayoutConfig​(SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the parameters (width, height, margin, SlideDirection, and DisplayMode) of a source layout.
      LayoutConfig​(Context context, AttrSet attrSet)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        clone, getHorizontalEndMargin, getHorizontalStartMargin, getLayoutDirection, getMarginBottom, getMarginLeft, getMarginRight, getMargins, getMarginsLeftAndRight, getMarginsTopAndBottom, getMarginTop, isMarginsRelative, setMarginBottom, setMarginLeft, setMarginRight, setMargins, setMarginsLeftAndRight, setMarginsRelative, setMarginsTopAndBottom, setMarginTop

        equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance, where the default width and height have been set for MATCH_CONTENT.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(Context context,
                    AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to use.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with specified layout width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width, which can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Indicates the height, which can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height,
                    SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the specified width, height, and alignment parameters of a layout.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width, which can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Indicates the height, which can be ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        direction - Indicates the SlideDirection value.
        Since:
        5

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(SlideDrawer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the parameters (width, height, margin, SlideDirection, and DisplayMode) of a source layout.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates parameters of the source layout.
        Since:
        5
